name: dm
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
abbreviation for direct message: a private message sent on a social media website, that only the person it is sent to can see: She received threats and abuse in her DMs.

abbreviation for direct message: to send someone a private message on a social media website: I'm selling my bike. DM me if you're interested.
